message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the opportunity to purchase this product. I believe it would greatly benefit you. I'm asking for $10,000. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $8,000 for it. Would you be willing to consider this price?
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking for a bit more than that. Would you be willing to meet me halfway at $9,000?
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I am still unable to meet at $9,000. However, I am willing to pay $8,500 for the product. Would this be acceptable?
